metaTags.content: A moist and decadent chocolate cake that defies expectations - a classic that transcends generations with its simplicity and irresistibly rich flavour. Born out of ingenuity during times of rationing, this cake captures the essence of resourcefulness without compromising on taste.

structuredData.name: Wacky Cake
structuredData.description: A moist and decadent chocolate cake that defies expectations - a classic that transcends generations with its simplicity and irresistibly rich flavour. Born out of ingenuity during times of rationing, this cake captures the essence of resourcefulness without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Sift dry ingredients into an 8x8-inch tin
In another corner put the vanilla
In a third corner put the melted butter
Pour the water evenly over the tin
For the frosting - Beat sugar, butter and cocoa with a bit of milk to desired consistency
Mix in a bit of coffee into the frosting to taste
